name: Tattle & Tale
description:
Created for the Clickjam #weirderstuff 2016.

I won't bother you with the details of one of these siblings became a ghost. But I will bore you about and evil wizard, who is planning to steal the souls of their deceased realtives in order to conquer the world!

Controls:

Arrows = Move
A= Jump
S= Shoot The Ghost
D= Spin while on the ground, buttbash when in the air
Enter= Pause Menu

(Controls can be edited on main screen, also plug in a controller to play using that!)
